name: Call of the Wild
description:
The cooldown of all of your Aspects

<spec>Marksmanship</spec>
<dynamic>and Trueshot</dynamic>

<spec>Survival</spec>
<dynamic>and Coordinated Assault</dynamic>

 is reduced by 25%.

name: Nessingwary's Trapping Apparatus
description: Whenever a trap is triggered, gain 25 Focus.

name: Soulforge Embers
description: Launching a Flare into your Tar Trap causes all enemies inside of the Tar Trap to burn for (900% of Attack power) Fire damage over 12 sec.

name: Craven Strategem
description: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

name: Dire Command
description: Kill Command has a 10% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target.

name: Flamewaker's Cobra Sting
description: Cobra Shot has a 10% chance to make your next Kill Command consume no Focus.

name: Qa'pla, Eredun War Order
description: Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 4.0 sec.

name: Rylakstalker's Piercing Fangs
description: While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 30%.

name: Eagletalon's True Focus
description: Trueshot also reduces the Focus cost of all of your abilities by 30%.

name: Surging Shots
description: Rapid Fire deals 15% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

name: Serpentstalker's Trickery
description: When Aimed Shot hits multiple targets from the Trick Shots effect, 3 enemies struck by the Aimed Shot also get hit by an Arcane Shot.

name: Secrets of the Unblinking Vigil
description: When you gain the Trick Shots effect, you have a 50% chance for it to not be consumed by your next Aimed Shot or Rapid Fire.

name: Wildfire Cluster
description: Wildfire Bomb drops an additional cluster of bombs around the target, each exploding for (33% of Attack power) Fire damage.

name: Rylakstalker's Confounding Strikes
description:
<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike has a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb.

name: Latent Poison Injectors
description:
Serpent Sting's damage applies Latent Poison to the target, stacking up to 10 times. 

<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike consumes all stacks of Latent Poison, dealing (10% of Attack power) Nature damage to the target per stack consumed.

name: Butcher's Bone Fragments
description:
<condition>Mongoose Bite</condition>
<dynamic>Mongoose Bite</dynamic>

Raptor Strike increases the damage of your next 

<condition>Butchery</condition>
<dynamic>Butchery</dynamic>

Carve by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.
